page.title: 15Vandalism in Patchway
page.content: In our school we have a swimming pool, but the vandals keep throwing things into our pool. Vandals are people who go around breaking other peoples property. In our school there are some goal posts. Vandals swing on them till they crack. Our sports shed was broken into by vandals. We had bats and balls stolen. The door was unlocked by a tool of some sort. The girls changing room has got a hole in the roof because of some vandals. We have a new cover on our pool and a net to go over it to stop vandals from throwing things in. I think they do vandalism because they are bored. We could stop vandalism by having more police on guard or having alarms. I think they mostly do vandalism in the evenings because there are not many people about.
